column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Our eyes were definitely bigger than our stomachs. We ordered the garlic bread appetizer and a medium Malnati's Classic. We had more than enough food for 2 people. Despite our waitress warning us that the pizza usually serves 4 people
column2: we figured we were that hungry. The garlic bread good as greasy
column3: but tomato dipping sauce helped even it all out. The pizza was absolutely delicious and best eaten warm with the ooey-gooey cheese spilling over. I wished we ordered a salad
column4: just so we would feel better about our gluttony.
